name: Burning Ghat
languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Burning Blood
traits.desc: Any creature that hits the burning ghat with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take 7 (2d6) fire damage.

traits.name: Odor
traits.desc: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the burning ghat must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the burning ghat’s odor for 24 hours.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The burning ghat makes two claw attacks.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Fire Burst (1/day)
actions.desc: The burning ghat unleashes a burst of flames in a 20-foot sphere centered on itself. Creatures in the area must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 (5d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
